description.en:
TBG is a project that provides cryptocurrency-based FX margin trading services. We will develop a system trading program optimized for FX margin trading and apply it to TBG solutions. The goal of the project is to serve as a bridge between the foreign exchange market and the cryptocurrency market.

TBG is a token that can be utilized in TBG solutions. 

TBG solution is a system trading program designed to generate sustainable and stable returns optimized for the foreign exchange market.
To develop TBG solutions, we have identified the characteristics of overseas market transactions and  established sales strategies using various auxiliary indicators.

Strategically planned trading logic was programmed through MQL language coding and applied to MT platform.

Through this process, we have developed an integrated trading solution optimized for system trading by logicizing the sales strategy created.
